title: Dedication to the holy goddesses

provenanceFound._: First recorded by D'Orville in his Sicula, on the basis of travels in the 1720s, but edited posthumously 1764; seen in the house of Giovanni Battista la Caniola in Taormina; subsequently in the collection of the Duca di Santo Stefano; reproduced by Torremuzza on the basis of D'Orville's edition; seen by Kaibel; now in the antiquarium.

museum.name: Antiquarium del Teatro Antico
museum.description: The collection in the "Casina degli Inglesi" consists of 20 inscriptions, 1 statue, two busts, a few mosaics, a 2nd C AD marble sarcophagus and some modern art
